:TYPE:C
:TITLE:calculated: Square area
:QUESTION:H
Find the area in m<sup>2</sup> of a square with sides of length {l} m.

:l-MIN:10
:l-MAX:100
:l-DEC:0

:l-VAL2:32
:l-VAL3:57
:l-VAL4:94
